content: उपदंशः {@--1@} Anything which excites thirst or appetite, a relish, condiment &c.; द्वित्रानुपदंशानुपपाद्य <ls>Dk. 133</ls>; अग्रमांसोपदंशं पिब नवशोणितासवं <ls>Ve. 3</ls> {@--2@} Biting, stinging. {@--3@} The venereal disease, chancre. {@--4@} ({%a%}) A tree the root of which is used for horse-radish (शिग्रु). ({%b%}) <ab>N.</ab> of another plant (समष्ठिल).
